title: American Crew Defining Paste, 3 Ounce
description: American crew defining paste adds texture and increased definition to the hair. This lanolin based paste provides great hold yet retaining pliability. Hair looks fuller with added texture. Beeswax provides a natural, pliable hold for various lengths. The wax-like consistency provides a matte finish while still remaining easy to distribute through hair.

title: NaturOli Soap Nut / Soapberry Shampoo 16oz Organic Natural Hair Care. Sulfate Free! Normal to Dry. EXTREME Hair is made with USDA organic soap nuts / soap berries! Gluten free. Vegan.
description: Our organic Soap Nuts / Soapberry Shampoos are here - and a HUGE SUCCESS!LARGE 16-oz recyclable bottle with golden toggle cap dispensing.Available in 2 formulas: "Normal to Oily" and "Normal to Dry".Pure, 100% botanical and SULFATE FREE!We formulated "EXTREME Hair" Soap Nut Shampoos with the utmost of care - selecting only the utmost quality of ultra-rich, effective botanical extracts and oils targeting hair and scalp issues.Enjoy powerful, yet gentle action, in unique Ayurvedic formulas.NOTE: A brief detox / clarifying period may be required.Our "EXTREME Hair" Soap Nuts Shampoo formulas are genuinely all-natural, botanical shampoos. They will rid your hair and scalp of years of hazardous chemical build up and residue. Initial results may seem less than ideal as your hair and scalp must first be purged of these unwanted, unhealthy substances. It may take a couple washings in the first week or so before fully realizing and experiencing all the wonders, benefits and beauty achieved with TRULY natural hair and scalp care.For our "Normal to Oily" formula see Amazon item: B003P7VX24Also see our VALUE PRICED Soap Nuts LARGE COMBO SETS with LOTS of Soap Nut goodies, see Amazon item: B004FSZAYO (with Normal to Oily formula) or item: B004FVYHM2 (with Normal to Dry formula).Soap Nuts "Starter" Size Combo Sets also available! Items: B004FXQBIS and B004FXV3UYSearch for: "NATUROLI COMBO SETS" in "ALL" Departments for many options to try out numerous Specially Packaged Sets of NaturOli TOP SELLERS!NaturOli is a proud Signer and "CHAMPION" of the Environmental Working Group and Skin Deep's "Safety in Cosmetics Campaign".
